history.proof: intros l1 l2 a. induction l1 as [|b l1' IHl1]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (eqA_dec a b) as [Eq | Neq]. + simpl. rewrite Eq. qsimpl. + rewrite IHl1. reflexivity.

No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet +.

original: intros l1 l2 a. induction l1 as [|b l1' IHl1]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (eqA_dec a b) as [Eq | Neq]. + simpl. rewrite Eq. rewrite IHl1. reflexivity. + rewrite IHl1. reflexivity.
